title: It wont stop disappearing
body: When i open league of legends and the launcher pops up, after pressing lauch it just dissapears???? And i dont know what to do all i want to do is play ARURF but im missing out because of this bug ive redownloaded LoL 5 times now and it wont go away ive tried winsock resets and changing my refresh rate but nothinggs working and i need help

replies.body: It sounds like you are still on the legacy client and need to get that updated, but your security settings might be blocking you.  The steps on the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should restore access and fix you up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Do i have to run all the tasks and what happens when i finish them
Yeah, going over every step helps rule out possibilities and make sure everything is covered.  The issue should then be resolved, but let me know if it persists.

For one of the steps it asks to check hard disk for errors but
It shows a totorial for windows 7 how do i do it for windows 10
